content: So if i have trees A B and a make a tree t := (mk val A B) and i apply a function womp to t, and want to access the modified A value how would I do that. Would the approach to use ST.Ref and use monadic combinators to do mk val (Ref.mk A) (Ref.mk B) somehow?
are you talking about docs#Tree or some other structure?
also what's the difference between ST.Ref and IO.Ref
